item.title: The Moon seeking his wife, ||ko'on
item.summary: The Moon in search of his wife. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-28. 8443–8445). The Moon returns home and finds that his wife ||ko'on is not there.
item.comments: 1) p.8442v: |han–kass'o heard this story from his aunt (|goe-an); details of their relationship, 2) The ending of the story is inconclusive, 3) See also The Moon not to be laughed at, 4) This story is found in Book VIII-28
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: asks the direction in which his wife has gone
the name of the Moon's is ||ko'on
